reviewText: If want a certificate then go for it. Nothing in this
It's basically an advertisement for Hubspot.

Material is good and I definitely learned something new. The problem is with advertising of HubSpot. It's everywhere in the course (every slide and video).It's strange to pay for this course and see tons of advertising.

This course is mostly a glance of what hubspot salesperson ought to be and is mostly geared towards selling to very affluent prospect such as techies, C-suite corp. It does give some input that can be used but in most of my experiences I had to convince people that they need something not necessarily allow them to find out what  they are missing out and stand your ground as Hubspot seems to advocate. Granted as they say  in the course there prospect are people or companies that actually showe interest in their products. So one need to keep that in mind.

Great course! great advices throughout the whole course, short videos that get straight to the point, and a lot of helpful resources that'll definitely come in handy in work later on throught your career in sales
The course is really good
The course was quite interesting, a lot of the scenarios I have experienced this year. The knowledge I have received from the various trainers I will take with me for a long time.

This course gives a detailed approach at every step of a sales journey. However, I think this is more suitable for a B2B scenario and high involvement products/services. Anyone taking this course thinking of B2C and moderate to low B2B products will not direct value. Indirectly you will find some places, to begin with. You can take this course for knowledge purposes. Hubspot's team has done really well.
Good
Great to proceed.
It could have had some customization for B2C and more reflection on business
This course is very important for newcomer in sale and marketing sites. It helps to enrich our knowledges
very helpful and makes more encourage with regards to the

Loved taking the course, especially the structure and readings provided. Due to a lot of content and assessment types, the course was engaging and a great balance between catering to the Sales knowledge needs of both a newcomer and an industry veteran. What could have been even more interesting were few sales scripts or mock call sessions to help people visualise and understand the nuances deeply.
Very informative course, found it very interesting and helpful.
excellent experience of learning .

Excellent course! Very well explained. It gives you clarity and helpfull tips for all the sales process. As feedback: I¬¥d like to see more about how to present/pitch/demo the product and how to make the proposal.
Good approach to sales techniques, easy to grasp and apply in real life scenarios.
Need More Practicals
Good courser but only suitable where your customer are hightech

The course teaches the fundamentals of sales planning and execution. This course will help to build the conceptual knowledge for sales. I recommend people willing to build a sales career to attend the course.

Effective, energizing, to the point. Doesn't matter if you're new to sales or an old hand looking to update your skillset, you'll find something of value to take away from the course. Can't say I'm a big fan of the blatant recruitment at the end, but the course itself is fine.

the quiz makes you double sure about all the learnings
Selling Techniques

Excellent course, which takes you through all the different steps of the sales process. The training material was professional providing practical examples. I would recommend this course not only to sales people, it is a great course for anyone who needs some sales knowledge in their lives: it is useful for interviews, "selling an idea to your colleagues", etc.
Extremely important course indeed.
Great course!

Es un buen curso, te ense√±a t√©cnicas para poder acercarte a las personas y poder vender no enfocado al producto, sino a las personas, a la ayuda que tus conocimientos, productos o servicios pueden ayudarle.
Great learning experience. Very interactive.
I love how they teach. Very comprehensive and helpful. Thank you hubspot.
THIS COURSE IS GREAT! I HAVE LEARNED A LOT. THANKS TO COURSERA FOR MAKING IT POSSSIBLE .
Fantastic refresher course!
THANK YOU
Great Course! I learnt brilliant tips in sales.
very practical. highly recommended, i rarely give reviews but when I do it really helps, it may not be from a famous institution but it is very practical if you are doing network marketing.
One of the best and interactive courses I have ever been into!
Extremely informative course curriculum clubbed with  super innovative practical negotiation questions.

It was a great  opportunity to understand the thinking and process behind every sales. The series of emails which are to be drafted with a goal were most useful. The course showed how a prospects should be made to realize the benefits and advantages of working with us over the competitors. The notes provided can help us to revise basic but important concepts. Thankyou

This was a great course for a beginner like myself. I genuinely appreciated the downloadable resources that were available throughout the course such as relevant scripts and templates and can't wait to continue practicing the methods learned.
excellent designed course for sales

I loved this course! I was applying for a sales position and an operations management position and was offered the operations management position. Even if I don't have to officially do sales in my new position, I can still use the techniques and strategies presented in this course for networking team work within the company and the sub-vendors/suppliers with whom I'll be working.
This course is a worth of time and effort who want keen knowledge  in the sales arena.
a good learning platform.
videos made it easier to memorize

I have learnt a lot from this course, earlier I used to think that sales is not much of importance than marketing but this course not only explains the techniques of a salesperson but also explains the etiquette one should apply in their professional life. The course was too the point.
I received some really useful skills
This course was really helpful and knowledgeable ,
A very fantastic course, designed well and recommended for Relationship Management.
Very useful üëçüòâ

It would be great to have more feedback from the HubSpot team! All the questions are well designed and up to the point. However, as we write, no one is checking our answers and the feedback is always valuable. By the very least, there could be more peer-graded assignments.

Outstanding teaching on what for me was such an abstract concept as inbound sales. The videos couldn't be more clear or better structured. The confidence of the instructors really helped you believe they have the experience you need to learn from. The resources they shared with me are going to be key for my current position! Thank you!

the course was really helpful and knowledgeable , it provided us with the written picture of the real world in sales, i am sure this will help us most in leading towards our sales career. thankyou so much for the course and thanks to all faculty members, hoping to get such more courses about the sales and about the industry trends in sales.
I found it very insightful. Thank you.
great course

I absolutely loved the course from Hubspot. The Explanations are to the point and comprehensive.All the reading materials provided will help you to ingrain your concepts much deeper. Anyone looking for Sales Role in their Industry I highly suggest this Course along with the other three specializations since they provide a better understanding of your core knowledge.
this course is cool.
Me encant√≥. Es contundente y pr√°ctico. Presenta los conceptos y herramientas esenciales para iniciar con pie derecho una carrera en ventas. 100% Recomendado

Great techniques and informative materials.Ive learn a lot of techniques and tips that I can use in my current job.Keep it coming hubspot you‚Äôve helped a lot of people like me that want to understand more in sales world.

I totally loved this course. never thought that an introvert like me will have the aptitude to sell. English is not my language but being verbal is important. understanding customers is important. and the fear of rejection should be conquered.
highly recommended
It serves what it says- Human-centric sales process. Helps make your sales calls systematic and have a clear view of the process.
Learned some new strategy and automation for better selling from this course and Thanks to Hubspot academy and the teachers of this course.

One of the most practical and to the point courses I have done so far. It not only teaches you relevant Sales Techniques at different stages of the Sales Process but also provide with specific valuable tools, resources, and implementable guidelines. Overall, a highly recommended course. Thank you, team Hubspot for this insightful experience.
Very engaging and easy to follow and comprehend!
Excellent teaching.
Thank you for this interesting and distinguished course
Great Course. Very practical tips for Sales Processes.

I got a good insight into sales.
The course was very effective in teaching the nuances of sales techniques.
very nice
It was a great experience and a lot of learning.
really good

Love the course it is one of the most elaborate step by step guide to a sales fresher. II myself was preparing for a sales job and this course truly helped me in every bit. I especially love the curated call, email format which we can use in our actual sales.
Really enjoyed the content and learned many new aspects of selling process. Course was in a structured format.
The course was really helpful and I have gathered a lot of knowledge about sales view and sales processing.
thanks
Excellent I learn a lot about sales.
my experience with coursera was amazing....thrilled as well with the insights being shared by the teamwill definitely recommend it to my colleagues as well...thanks
Very helpful for someone who is looking into a sales career.
Very Interesting course, filled with plenty of information and insights
Thanks for a nice course and helpful tips. What I'd love to have more examples with objections.

It was a really great understanding that I received through following this Course, I got very clear of how should I map my pitch when it comes to Negotiations and Closing a Sale!Really excited about it and I can wait to put it to action with my upcoming prospects in my sales career.Thank you, Hubspot for this very valuable Course.
I already use hubspot and these 4 courses in giving my a much broader insight and tips in order to help me work effectively.
Course really helps you, how to become pro sales staff and  what to do or not to do.
Excellent course! Top class advises that I will definitely use in my sales activities.
Provide detail standard sales process for newbie, either for professional.If it is possible, can you share further detail about several CRM & CRM standard.
it was  excellent course and material . amazing style of learning .

Really practical and easy to follow. The materials are genuinely helpful and simple to understand. This course was very accessible and I am recommending it to my friends who I think will gain a lot from it.
Thank you hubspot for putting together a human centric approach for Sales. Highly effective training module.
This is a solid, step-by-step, approach to the basics of the sales process. Gives me great confidence!
Amazing content conveyed in a simple way throughout the course. One of the best courses I've come across in sales domain!
It was excellant

I am satisfied with course and will recommend others too
Very practical course with a lot of real life experiences. I found the suggestions and methods very useful especially as someone with a limited knowledge of sales.
verygood
Great lessons! Very detail oriented and explanatory! Great for refreshing your sales techniques.
